health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about grants received in the financial year 2017/2018 for health system transformation and projects implementation were held during the County Assembly debates.
health_data_challenges: The challenges related to discrepancies in grant amounts and project implementation status were identified during the discussions.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: No specific recommendations were discussed in relation to health service delivery.
health_sector_decisions: No decisions or resolutions were made regarding the financing of the health sector.
health_evidence_base: Reports from the Controller of Budget and information from the Mombasa County Treasury were used to inform the discussions.
